articles.content:
Your code begins by damning man as evil, then demands that he practice a good
which it defines as impossible for him to practice. It demands, as his first
proof of virtue, that he accept his own depravity without proof. It demands
that he start, not with a standard of value, but with a standard of evil, which
is himself, by means of which he is then to define the good: the good is that
which he is not.
